name: In the Matter of Amy Ellen LLOYD Petition for Reinstatement from Inactive Status

parties: In the Matter of Amy Ellen LLOYD Petition for Reinstatement from Inactive Status.

opinions.text:
’ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of November, 2003, The Report and Recommendations of The Disciplinary Board of the Supreme Court of Pennsylvania dated October 10, 2003, are approved and IT IS ORDERED that AMY ELLEN LLOYD, who has been on inactive status, has never been suspended or disbarred, and has demonstrated that she has the moral qualifications, competency and learning in law required for admission to practice in the Commonwealth, shall be and is, hereby reinstated to active status as a member of the Bar of this Commonwealth. The expenses incurred by the Board in the investigation and processing of the Petition for Reinstatement shall be paid by the Petitioner.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
839 A.2d 181
In the Matter of Amy Ellen LLOYD Petition for Reinstatement from Inactive Status.
No. 107 DB 2003.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 24, 2003.
